name: The Dreamchaser
description:
From the creator of: 
Monstruct! (2017 IGMC 5th Place)
Abyss of Oblivion (2018 IGMC 5th Place)

===

An entry for the RPG Maker MZ "You Got It, Now Use It" Game Jam

===

You play as Bassario Richmond, a retired adventurer who later found success through business. One day, a letter from an old friend brings news of a great tragedy, and Bassario finds himself back in the world he thought he had left behind. 

No longer young,  he now fights not with swords, but with wit and experience in trade. He now leads the prominent Expedition Guild, Rêveraile, and must save it from the brink of bankruptcy.

===

  • Recruit, manage, and deploy adventurers on Expeditions to discover loot while remaining profitable.
  • Utilize the Auction House, influence bidders, and sell rare treasures of untold value.
  • Learn the demands of different markets and Export items to reap in profits.

===

- Public release.
